alert.note: Alert for Henry; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 4:43PM CDT until June 07 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Weakley County in west Tennessee... Northwestern Henry County in west Tennessee... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 442 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Palmersville, or 15 miles northwest of Paris, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Cottage Grove, Palmersville, Puryear, Matheny Grove, Mill Creek, Osage, Whitlock, Jones Mill, Foundry Hill, Conyersville, Crossland and Como. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
